text: While New York Fashion Week is clearly all about the fashion sent down the runway, there are also many MOMENTS. Moments so cool, so fun, so WTF - random that we can't help but share them with everyone who's following along. Here, a running list of our favorites : Eckhaus Latta shows at PS1 A snowy, 9 : 30 p. m. time slot at MoMA's space in Long Island City could be enough to torpedo your show, but it was standing room only at Eckhaus Latta.
